page.title: 03WESTROP SCHOOL,HIGHWORTH
page.content: Westrop school is at the bottom of Highworth near Home Farm.It was built in 1968 and was officially opened on 25th February 1969.Most children come from Home Farm Estate,Windrush and the St.Michael's Avenue part of Highworth.The building has two floors and a flat roof.It has ten classrooms and three spare rooms .There are 293 pupils and ten full time teachers.One other teacher comes two days a week.The average number of children in a class is 33. The highest number of children in the school is in June,as infants come up but Juniors don't go up then.In 1985 the Headmaster is Mr. Dennis Toomer.
